description: [[Kawaii]] future bass (also known simply as kawaii bass) is a subgenre of future bass, known for its happy and cute [[timbre]] and strong [[Japanese popular culture|Japanese pop culture]] influences. Often, [[chiptune]] sounds, soft [[Square wave (waveform)|square wave]]s, [[Sampling (music)|samples]] from [[anime]] or [[video game]]s, [[percussion instrument]]s, and door and bed squeaks are incorporated into such songs. [[Snail's House]] and other producers have produced tracks of this subgenre, with the former being credited as the genre pioneer after releasing the extended play ''Kirara'' in 2015.
